OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord histologic category ( recurrent glioblastoma multiforme [ close accrual 11/30/01 ] v recurrent anaplastic astrocytoma v recurrent anaplastic oligodendroglioma ) . Patients receive oral temozolomide twice daily 5 consecutive day . Courses repeat every 28 day 1 year absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
